original_text: So he did what the Lord had told him. He went to the Kerith Ravine, east of the Jordan, and stayed there.
korean_text: 그가 여호와의 말씀과 같이 하여 곧 가서 요단 앞 그릿 시냇가에 머물매

sentences.original_text: So he did what the Lord had told him.
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그는 주님께서 자신에게 말씀하신 것을 행했습니다.

sentences.original_text: He went to the Kerith Ravine,
